posts.post_title: T206 Chase for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe Drouillard
Hello Everyone,

I just upgraded, so I have a 1910 Piedmont/350 Hal Chase Throwing, Dark Cap SGC40 for sale or trade. No creases. $59.00 delivered. Paypal, check or money order.
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/003-10.jpg[/IMG]
First email that says I'll take it gets it.

Thanks,

Joe

posts.post_title: T206 Chase for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe Drouillard
One bump before eBay.

I have received a few questions about what I would want in trade for the Chase. If you have a T206 SGC 50 common that I don't already have it would probably be an even swap. 

Thanks, 

Joe
